definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
Song of the Southern dynasties (420-479), with capital at Nanjing/also known as Liu Song 劉宋|刘宋

sentences.english: One chapter, investigate time spirit and reasons of theme choice.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分，考察南朝辭賦題材選擇的時代精神及原因。

sentences.english: Compared with Nan dynasties, the works of Sao Style have its own characteristic, though its quantity is not too large.
sentences.chinese: 北朝騷體之作數量不多，但與南朝相比自有其特色。

sentences.english: The school is financed by American and South Korean evangelical Christians.
sentences.chinese: 學校的資金由美國和南朝鮮福音派教會提供。

sentences.english: Korea still keeps people locked up for refusing to perform military service.
sentences.chinese: 甚至南朝鮮把拒絕服兵役的人關起來。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the different formations of the disyllabic words in You Ming Lu, an anthology in Nan dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 南朝小說《幽明錄》的複音詞有多種構詞方式。

sentences.english: Southern Dynasties, blue-glaze teapot with a chicken head .
The system of sending envoys of inspection was conducive to the maintenance of the rule of the Southern Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 這一制度對於維護南朝的統治秩序起到了積極作用。

sentences.english: The various expressions of this kind of marriage spoke of the decline of family power and its influence.
sentences.chinese: 南朝國婚士族種種表現反映了門閥士族的相對衰落。

sentences.english: The South Korean businessmen will take great risk for the slave labor.
sentences.chinese: 南朝鮮的商人是爲了這些奴隸勞工才冒這麼大的險。

sentences.english: These refugees had to be fed and housed in the South. A few thousand crossed over from South to North.
sentences.chinese: 於此同時也有幾千人從南朝鮮逃到北朝鮮。

sentences.english: In FanYe's time-South Dynasties , regime alternated frequently.
sentences.chinese: 范曄所處的南朝時代，政權更迭頻繁。

sentences.english: Though there are a number of inscriptions in the Southern Dynasties, only a few stand out.
sentences.chinese: 南朝銘文數量頗多，然而成就突出者則較少。

sentences.english: The ROKs apparently have no stomach for fighting Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 南朝鮮人很顯然並沒有與中國人作戰的勇氣。

sentences.english: Statue of Northern Zhou Dynasty in Maijishan has obvious characteristics of Xiao Liang's statue in the Southern Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 麥積山北周造像具有明顯的南朝蕭梁造像特徵。

sentences.english: Rhododendron, originated in the Southern Dynasties, Song Yuan in the development and prosperity in the Ming and Qing Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 雲錦，起源於南朝，發展於元宋，興盛於明清。

definition: Tang of the Five Southern Dynasties 937-975
Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479), with capital at Nanjing
Wei of the Northern Dynasties (386-534), founded by the Tuoba 拓跋 branch of Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑
Song dynasty (960-1279)/used to distinguish it from 劉宋|刘宋 Song of Southern dynasties (420-479)
